apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple with a heart on Apple devices features two figures with medium-light and light skin tones, nestled closely together, with a vibrant, glossy heart floating between them. Appleâ€™s design language imbues the figures with soft, rounded edges and a gentle 3D effect, making them appear warm and intimate. The heart emoji, rendered with bright highlights and smooth gradients, signifies deep affection, romantic love, or a strong, loving bond between the couple, perfect for sharing moments of romance.
